mapper.select: select ot.res_num as resNum, ot.user_id as userId, to_char(ot.res_indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as resIndate, ht.des_nm as desNm, ot.hair_type as hairType, ot.price as price from order_tbl ot, hairSalon_tbl ht where ot.des_num = ht.des_num and ot.res_indate >= sysdate and ot.user_id = #{userId }

select ot.res_num as resNum, ot.user_id as userId, to_char(ot.res_indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as resIndate, ht.des_nm as desNm, ot.hair_type as hairType from order_tbl ot, hairSalon_tbl ht where ot.des_num = ht.des_num and res_indate < sysdate and ot.user_id = #{userId }
mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_TBL ( res_Num, user_Id, des_Num, res_Indate, hair_Type, price ) values ( res_num_seq.nextval, #{userId }, #{desNum }, to_date(#{resIndate }, 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24:MI'), #{hairType }, #{price } )
